comments.html: About headsets: the last discovered are the best IMHO http://www.jabra.com/Products/Wireless_Headsets/Jabra_MOTION_UC_Series

comments.html: WebEx, gotomeeting etc. are no doubt quality web conferencing products. I simply love them. However, I needed a onetime payment option and hence have switched over to RHUB web conferencing appliances.
